title: Ironmonger

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to make one of your Machines kill the person they visit. They are unaware that they killed someone: you are aware that they killed someone. The kill is attributed to them and not to you (but still counts towards your Destiny).
- At night, instead you may choose to cause all your Machines to self-destruct, dying to an Unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, you will secretly install mechanisms within a random player who visits you. They become your Machine.
- You know everyone who is a Machine - they do not know they are Machines.
- If a Machine visits you, they commit suicide upon realizing what they are.
- You appear innocent if you have no Machines.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:

*"Nobody fixes things. When they break you throw them away."*
